TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed Option extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Enumerates values returned by several types and taken as a parameter of the member.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.Option Closest = int32(3)

summary.para: This option is used with to retrieve a frame (not necessarily a key frame) associated with a data source that is located closest to or at the given time.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.Option ClosestSync = int32(2)

summary.para: This option is used with to retrieve a sync (or key) frame associated with a data source that is located closest to (in time) or at the given time.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.Option NextSync = int32(1)

summary.para: This option is used with to retrieve a sync (or key) frame associated with a data source that is located right after or at the given time.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.Option PreviousSync = int32(0)

summary.para: This option is used with to retrieve a sync (or key) frame associated with a data source that is located right before or at the given time.
